mainHero.title: Start training with the
mainHero.subtitle: Living Fit Family.
mainHero.description: Join my in person training program from wherever you may live. Start training on the same workout splits as my local clients, take advantage of the specific nutritional guidance, and enjoy achieving real results. Over the years, hundreds of women have met and exceeded their fitness goals training as a part of the Living Fit Family. Now you can too!

items.title: Effectively plan ahead for productive workouts
items.description: Stay disciplined and consistent with the provided workout templates. Plan ahead by selecting your excerises for each day ahead of time.
items.old_description: Just edit the config.json file with details about your company and voila your beautiful state of the art landing page is ready to go live! Remember to also update your assets, add any images you want to show to /assets/images and link them in the config.json

items.title: Make it personal
items.description: Create your workout based on what you have available. Whether you're at a commercial gym or home gym, there are a variety of exercise options that can work for you.

features.title: How it works
features.subtitle: Updated training splits every four weeks
features.description: Get the same results from this app as clients would with in person training. Updates to the app ensure everyone stays on the same structured split, whether local or remote.
features.old_description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

items.name: Exercise Demos
items.description: Each excersise option is paired with a video demonstration from in person sessions, including number of sets and reps.

items.name: Interchangeable exercise options
items.description: Select a variety of exercises to customize your individual workout routines, within the structured split.

items.name: Personalized Nutrition Information
items.description: Daily macros are caculated based on your unique goals and current physique. Your personalized macros are paired with helpful nutritional tips.

items.name: Live chat with Luke and other members
items.description: Share your progreess, talk with other members, and get helpful tips from the trainer live from the app.
